original_title: Three dead after being struck by lightning
original_body_lines: Three persons died this evening (Aug. 11) after being struck by lightning in the Mihintale area.
According to the police, three individuals of a group of seven who had gone fishing on the Thammannawa Wewa in Mihintale were reported dead after being struck by lightning.
The bodies of the deceased, who were in their 40s, are placed at the Thammannawa Hospital.
